name: Dorothy - NSC 2019 2nd Place
description: The "Dorothy" program is a program that was developed to solve problems. Some autistic children with defects in areas such as concentration, intelligence, social interaction and from studying about children with autism the development team saw that Programs related to the development of autistic children There are still few and not interesting enough so we developed teaching aids. And that mobile phone has access to everyone Not even children with autism, so this program has games to play to increase skills and as an example of modern learning. There are also many games within the program to create understanding and interest for autistic children. Through modern media and technology and as a way of living more This program can grow with modern technology.
